meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish and neat in dress and appearance.
meanings.sent1: His dapperness at the party made him stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent2: She always exudes dapperness with her well-coordinated outfits.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the dapperness of the well-groomed poodle next door.
meanings.sent4: The dapperness of the peacock's feathers caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The actor's dapperness on the red carpet left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The state of being smart and trim in appearance.
meanings.sent1: His dapperness in the suit made him look very professional.
meanings.sent2: The groom's dapperness was evident as he waited at the altar.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled with surprising dapperness across the icy terrain.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's dapperness on the field inspired his teammates to do their best.
meanings.sent5: The magician's dapperness added an air of mystery to his performance.
